Title: Relates to housing courts
Summary: Provides that in the city of New York, a part of the court shall be devoted to actions and proceedings where: every party to the proceeding is a natural person; or the petitioner alleges in its petition that it is a "small landlord"; makes related provisions.
LawSection: New York City Civil Court Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York city civil court act, in relation to housing courts
